results.content: I think the teacher speaks very fast and I cannot understand very well. Also I think he is talking about craziness of the things that React has but definitely I didn't see any crazy thing there!

response.content: I appreciate the feedback. By craziness I mean unconventional. I'm just trying to share content that brings two very large topics together hat i am passionate about from a hobbyists perspective. I'm sorry if this was hard to follow every course i do twice. I did that with the first one  and the ground work is already laid out for the two following that one. This one is no different and that is something i guarantee. My content is not for everyone and I understand that feel free to reach out on facebook or let me  know if there was something i could explain better. And your right i drink a lot of coffee which creates 90 mile an our speech bursts.
